titleStmt.title: Eight sermons, preached by Iohn Prideaux, Doctor of Diuinity, Regius Professor, Vice-Chancellor of the Vniuersity of Oxford, and rector of Exceter Colledge. The severall texts and titles of the sermons, follow in the next leafe
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1587-1650.

titleStmt.title: Eight sermons, preached by Iohn Prideaux, Doctor of Diuinity, Regius Professor, Vice-Chancellor of the Vniuersity of Oxford, and rector of Exceter Colledge. The severall texts and titles of the sermons, follow in the next leafe
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1587-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Felix Kyngston, for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Seven of the eight sermons have separate title pages, each with same imprint.

Contents: 1. Christs counsell for ending law cases. 2. Ephesus backsliding: considered and applyed to these times. 3. A Christians free-will offering. 4. The first fruits of the resurrection. 5. Gowries conspiracie. A sermon preached at St. Maries in Oxford, the fifth of August. 6. Higgaion & Selah: For the discovery of the powder-plot. 7. Hezekiahs sicknesse and recoverie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
